page.title: 14Local Sports and Pastimes 1
page.content:
The local sports tend to cater simply for the resident village population but there are several activities which are quite unique to this part of the country. Although more in evidence at the larger shows and events these activities are: HOUND TRAILING FELL RUNNING CUMBERLAND AND WESTMORLAND WRESTLING
Being close to the Lake District National Park means that there are many facilities available for those who enjoy all forms of outdoor activities. In the area itself the residents can also participate in various field sports such as clay pigeon shooting.
